name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
setup: Extend one leg forward, heel on ground, toes up
Hands on hips or reaching toward extended foot
steps: Hinge at hips and lean forward toward extended leg
Feel stretch in hamstring of extended leg
Return to start and switch legs
mistakes: Rounding spine instead of hinging at hips
safety: Gentle stretch only. If hamstrings are tight, reduce depth or use seated variation.

regressions: Wall hamstring stretch (foot elevated on low surface)
progressions: Standing hamstring stretch with toe reach

prescriptionHints.notes: Hold 30-60s each leg. Great post-run or post-workout stretch.

joints.notes: Avoid rounding spine. Keep back knee soft to reduce strain.
